wikipedia_page.main: Geoff Denial (31 January 1932 – 24 March 2020) was an English former footballer who played for Sheffield United, Oxford United and Rugby Town. During his spell at Oxford, he played 199 games in all competitions. He was called up during the Suez Crisis before he made his debut for Oxford United.

response: *Geoff Denial, professional footballer for Sheffield United and Oxford United, was born in Stocksbridge.
*Geoff Denial, 88, English footballer (Oxford United, Sheffield Town).Geoff Denial
